src:
Hasil Liga Inggris: Everton vs Tottenham Hotspur 1-1
03 Nov 2019, 18:28 by Terjemahan, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Everton harus bermain imbang dengan Tottenham Hotspur dalam laga lanjutan Liga Inggris pekan ke-11. Bermain di markas sendiri, Stadion Goodison Park, Everton menyudahi laga dengan skor 1-1 dari Tottenham, Senin dini hari, 4 November 2019.
Spurs unggul lebih dulu di babak kedua. Dele Alli mencetak gol pada menit ke-63. Skor berubah 1-0 untuk Spurs.
Sepanjang pertandingan Everton bisa mengimbangi permainan Spurs. Tim tuan rumah bisa melepaskan lima tembakan ke gawang dan dua diantaranya tepat sasaran.
Sementara Spurs melepaskan empat tembakan ke gawang tim tuan rumah dan dua diantaranya tepat sasaran. Namun dari sisi penguasaan bola, Spurs unggul dengan memegang kendali 56 persen ball possession.
Spurs bermain dengan 10 orang saat laga memasuki menit ke-79. Pemain asal Korea Selatan, Son Heung Min mendapat kartu merah dari wasit. Keunggulan pemain tersebut coba dimanfaatkan Everton untuk menyamakan kedudukan.
Akhirnya gol penyeimbang datang juga. Adalah Cenk Tosun yang menjadi penyelamat Everton saat mencetak gol di perpanjangan waktu, yakni menit ke-90+7.
Dengan tambahan satu angka posisi Spurs belum membaik di klasemen Liga Inggris. Mereka menempati peringkat 11 dengan 13 poin. Sementara Everton tertahan di posisi ke-17 dengan 11 poin.

PREMIER LEAGUE
text:
Premier League Results: Everton vs Tottenham Hotspur 1-1
03 Nov 2019, 18:28 by translations, Aditya Budiman
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Everton have to draw with Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League match-up to Week 11. Playing at home base, Goodison Park Stadium, Everton ended the match with a score of 1-1 from Tottenham, early Monday morning, November 4, 2019.
Spurs took the lead in the second half. Dele Alli scored in the 63rd minute. The score changed 1-0 for Spurs.
Throughout the match Everton can match the Spurs game. The home team can release five shots on goal and two of them on target.
While Spurs fired four shots at the home team's goal and two of them were on target. But in terms of ball possession, Spurs excel by holding control of 56 percent ball possession.
Spurs played with 10 people when the game entered the 79th minute. South Korean player, Son Heung Min received a red card from the referee. The advantage of these players try to use Everton to equalize.
Finally the equalizer came too. Cenk Tosun was the savior of Everton when scoring in extra time, namely the 90th minute + 7.
With the addition of one point, the Spurs' position has not improved in the Premier League. They are ranked 11th with 13 points. While Everton stuck in 17th position with 11 points.

PREMIER LEAGUE
